title: SOLD: Cy Young RPPC With Dog
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: Cy Young RPPC With Dog
posts.post_content:
Only one I've ever seen of Cy Young on his farm with his loyal dog, circa 1950.  


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=295310&d=1511022542[/IMG]

I'll take it.

I'm a dog lover, I cannot not own this.
